channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 17:11 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).
item.description: 🟠 17:11 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).#Pologovsky_ district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 17:10 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.

item.title: 🟡 17:02 Flashing of anxiety in Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 17:02 Flashing of anxiety in Kharkiv region. item.title: 🟠 14:07 Free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291
